subfields.a: International Conference on Land Tenure and Related Problems in World Agriculture

subfields.b: proceedings of the International Conference on Land Tenure and Related Problems in World Agriculture, held at Madison, Wisconsin, 1951 /

subfields.c: edited by Kenneth H. Parsons, Raymond J. Penn, and Philip M. Raup.
